segments.text: I walked in and was shocked by what I saw.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is running full blast, overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even turn around; she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is splashing down the cabinetsâ€”it's unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, look at those kids over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool that's tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, like she's in on the secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart skipped a beat thinking about the stool tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This place is full of surprises, not all good.
segments.speaker: PAR
